room_title: Escape room "The Contraption" by Escape Room Rhode Island in Providence
room_description:
You and your group of adventure-seekers must attempt to outwit the mysterious "Professor X"! For years, he and his army of robots have been testing mankind 's abilities by utilizing the world's strangest contraptions.

It's up to you to outsmart his machines and show him who's boss!! A fun, faced paced fantasy-filled adventure!
